name: SpaceWrestler XL
description:
SpaceWrestler XL: an intergalactic body-slamming rampage!

The new beefed-up version of SpaceWrestler! New and improved gameplay mechanics, boss characters and a new soundtrack make this the most explosive SpaceWrestler event yet!

'Mad Meteor' Mike became the more powerful wrestler on Earth, and after winning WrestleDeath XL 1986, he ascended and transformed into a cosmic titan of wrestling power. Too big for Earth and hungry for foes to challenge him, Mike travelled through space, slamming planets to fuel his powers while ancient Wrestle-Lords try to take him down.

Dodge and outmanoeuvre rivals while building up power, then slam them out of the galaxy when the time is right. Grab folding chairs, TVs and other weapons to put the odds in your favour!

'Generate-a-Wrestler' feature gives the powerful Wrestle-Lords unique names and appearances as you fight through space, who knows who you'll be drop kicking next?
